title: Dagonova míza (svitek)
content:
Dagonova míza

Notes contain the formula for a potion made with secretions of the legendary Dagon. The potion unlocks the ability to acquire a Strength upgrade when consumed.

This potion can only be made with secretions of the mythical Dagon. The upgrade acquired is "True Grit".

Zápisy do Deníku

Receptury: Dagonova míza

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
800  	160  




Lokace
Poustevník
Reward for completion of Cesty osudu. On Berengar's remains if Geralt kills him, or a gift from Berengar if Geralt does not fight him.
